message.body: I just realized I neglected to inspect your carbon fork! Eye that up for large chips/gouges/cracks before riding it. I can't believe I didn't think of that.
Well, I had to know. After looking up the manual for your shifters, the bolt is in fact under the top of the rubber boot. Not low or inside on the shifter like
The bike is still at ###### so you can look at it again tomorrow if you want ;-)
